summary:
Yunsol is Korean custom voiced archer follower.
There is another Helgen raid Survivor.
Yunsol is that person who came from East.
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][/center][center][img]https://i.imgur.com/wNhwzyr.png[/img]

[font=Georgia][size=5]My mod is on Nexus hot files!
I really appreciate everyone.[/size][/font]

[/size]
[youtube]vIkfzp-DBTk[/youtube]

[size=3]This video's Yunsol introduction start from 3:24[/size]

[font=Georgia][color=#9900ff][size=5]Thanks for introduction video!
[/size][/color][/font][/center]
[center][font=Georgia][color=#1e84cc][size=6][ EOMSIC Yunsol Custom Voice Follower ][/size][/color][/font][/center][center][size=3]
Yeah, custom voice version Yunsol is released.
I'm say sorry for late to you again.
[/size][size=3]Most of this mod was made by my own strength.
I had a lot to study and I had a little time to give up,
Thanks to you, I was able to finish it.
As i said, all of information of this mod is on the images.
Thanks again.
Have a good time!

[/size][font=Georgia][size=5]SE version -> [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/13453?]EOMSIC Yunsol Custom Voice Follower SE[/url]
[/size][/font]
[font=Georgia][color=#1e84cc][size=6][ Change log ][/size]
[/color][/font]
[size=3][color=#1e84cc][font=Georgia](v1.1) 2017/11/06 :[/font] [/color]Dragonborn(DLC), HDT high heel system has been removed from the master files. [/size]
[size=3]In fact, these mods were not needed for Yunsol.[/size]

[size=3][font=Georgia][color=#1e84cc](v1.2) 2017/11/06 :[/color][/font] Now, you can choose Yunsol's weight from 0, 50, 100.[/size]
[size=3]Reference : [url=https://i.imgur.com/X3HWoe7.png]https://i.imgur.com/X3HWoe7.png[/url][/size]

[size=3][font=Georgia][color=#1e84cc](v1.3) 2017/11/07 :[/color][/font] Neck seam problem of 0, 100 weight is solved.[/size]
[size=3]After reinstall, you need to new start or play with clean save file.
Clean save refers to save without residue of 1.2 version.
After removing the 1.2 version Yunsol, turn on the Skyrim again and save,
Once you have installed version 1.3, you can play Skyrim again.
It is best to save at a non-Sleeping Giant Inn.

[size=3][font=Georgia][color=#1e84cc](v1.4) 2017/11/08 :[/color][/font][color=#1e84cc] [/color]Fix skeleton missing while building weight option files.
[/size][/size][size=5][color=#ff0000]Sound Quality Improved![/color] [/size][size=3]Thanks a lot TarotGyoju, Artieas.

[size=3][color=#1e84cc][font=Georgia](v1.5) 2017/11/10 :[/font] [/color]Added 2K body texture optional files.

[font=Georgia][color=#1e84cc](v1.51) 2017/11/11 :[/color][/font] Changed the hair that was worn with the wig to the basic hair.
Now Yunsol does not wear wigs by default.[/size]
[/size]
